price: Mais celui qui se sera repenti, qui aura cru et fait le bien, il se peut alors qu’il soit parmi ceux qui réussissent.
arabic: فَأَمَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَعَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-ammā man tāba waāmana waʿamila ṣāliḥan faʿasā an yakūna mina al-muf'liḥīna
